top_categories.workout_context: 9,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
72ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Vapor Trail 125's Colorado high-altitude mountains, Mountain gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 125 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Vapor Trail 125's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before September.
At Vapor Trail 125, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
At mile 60 of 125, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Vapor Trail 125. Train it until it feels boring.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 125 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
9,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Vapor Trail 125, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 9,000ft of climbing on Colorado high-altitude mountain gravel does to your power file on race day.
Low-cadence force work for 9,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Vapor Trail 125’s 125 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.altitude: Vapor Trail 125 with 9,000ft of climbing, much of it above 8,000ft demands altitude preparation. Arrive 5–7 days early for acclimatization. Expect 5–15% power reduction at altitude. Increase iron intake 4 weeks out. Hydrate aggressively — altitude increases fluid loss by 20–40%. Extreme altitude (10,000ft+); Long exposure at altitude.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Vapor Trail 125 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on colorado high-altitude mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: colorado high-altitude mountains, mountain gravel, 125-mile distance.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on VO2max, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 125 miles of colorado high-altitude mountain gravel in Leadville, Colorado.
